soft-root.label: soft root
soft-root.description: A quiet strength that holds you gently from below.

warm-courage.label: warm courage
warm-courage.description: A small steady warmth that helps truth come forward.

quiet-seeing.label: quiet seeing
quiet-seeing.description: Noticing without effort, like watching light move on water.

inner-spring.label: inner spring
inner-spring.description: A fresh movement inside you that wants to grow.

open-field.label: open field
open-field.description: A sense of spaciousness around your thoughts.

shared-fire.label: shared fire
shared-fire.description: The warmth that appears when hearts gather close.

guiding-light.label: guiding light
guiding-light.description: A small honest brightness that shows the next inch.

mountain-circle.label: mountain circle
mountain-circle.description: The quiet belonging felt when people stand together.
